# Pull Request

## Description

Describe your changes

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (does not break existing functionality)
- [ ] New feature (new functionality, not breaking)
- [ ] Breaking change (functionality is breaking)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Related Issue

Closes #(issue number) - if applicable

## Testing

- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Configuration verified
- [ ] Tests updated (if necessary)

## Commit Convention

Ensure all commits follow this format:

```
type(scope): description
```

**Allowed Scopes:** coordinator, sensor, config, template, utility-meter, const, manifest, translations, mock, architecture, init, deps, ci, brands

See: [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for details

## Checklist

- [ ] Code formatted with Prettier (`npm run prettier-fix`)
- [ ] Commitlint validated (automatic via Husky)
- [ ] No new warnings/errors
- [ ] Documentation updated (if necessary)
- [ ] Translations updated (if necessary)

## Screenshots (if UI changes)

If applicable: insert screenshots or GIFs
